name: PKPushRegistry
desc: An object that requests the delivery and handles the receipt of PushKit notifications.

items.name: init(queue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Creates a push registry with the specified dispatch queue.

items.name: var delegate: PKPushRegistryDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object that receives notifications coming from the push registry object.

items.name: protocol PKPushRegistryDelegate
items.desc: The methods that you use to handle incoming PushKit notifications and registration events.

items.name: var desiredPushTypes: Set<PKPushType>?
items.desc: Registers the push types for this push registry object.

items.name: func pushToken(for: PKPushType) -> Data?
items.desc: Retrieves the locally cached push token for the specified push type.
